name: Fight Tewi/Kasen
_source: speak;Tewi;Oh hey, it's the mountain hermit. Whatcha up to?
speak;Kasen;You've got some nerve, trying to chat me up in the middle of a battle.
speak;Tewi;C'mon, no need to be so serious. Now...may I interest you in another|little bunny for your menagerie~?
speak;Kasen;...|{tgm}Are you seriously trying to bribe me?;no_talk
